alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued October 22 at 3:40PM MST until October 22 at 5:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 545 PM MST. * At 339 PM MST, a dust channel was 7 miles north of Maricopa, or 10 miles west of Sun Lakes, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 164 and 168. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 179 and 189. Locations impacted include... Sun Lakes and Firebird Lake. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
